document.full_text: dutch chip maker nxp bv is not in takeover talks, its chief executive said on friday, although he would consider an offer like the one texas instruments inc made for national semiconductor corp.
document.title: nxp not for sale, would consider a rich offer: ceo
lines_and_colors: dutch chip maker nxp bv is not in takeover talks, its chief executive said on friday, although he would consider an offer like the one texas instruments inc made for national semiconductor corp.
